Description: Join us for a live stream with Julia Kordick, Software Global Black Belt at Microsoft, as she demonstrates how AI-assisted tools like GitHub Copilot and autonomous agents are transforming large-scale COBOL modernization. Julia will showcase a live demo of migrating legacy COBOL, covering reverse engineering, automated documentation, test generation, and code transformation.
Author: GitHub
Title: Modernizing Legacy: COBOL to Cloud with GitHub Copilot
